video.title: Counting Cars: Collection
video.synopsis: Danny Koker and his crew at the Las Vegas-based Count's Kustoms use their talents to restore and customize a wide range of cars and motorcycles.

episodes.synopsis: Mistress of the Dark Elvira brings her famed Thunderbird to the shop; a custom car isn't ready for a couple who traveled cross country to pick it up.
episodes.title: Satanic Mechanic

episodes.synopsis: Danny and Shannon honor fallen troops with a custom patriotic motorcycle; Danny and Kevin acquire a 1971 Monte Carlo for a customer who can't pay up.
episodes.title: Politically Correct

episodes.synopsis: Danny and the guys try to make a motorcycle ride possible for a friend with physical limitations; car lovers pull Danny over to check out his ride.
episodes.title: Size Matters

episodes.synopsis: Danny conspires with a proud dad to give the ultimate surprise 16th birthday gift; the shop frustrates a customer with a design error.
episodes.title: Really Sweet 16

episodes.synopsis: Danny gets an astronomical offer for a prized car; Kevin helps spot an epic flip; the guys visit the world's biggest and most extravagant auto show.
episodes.title: Count's Cryptonite

episodes.synopsis: The shop agrees to build a hot-rod wheelchair for a brave father; Danny gets caught in a bind when a pink car project doesn't go as planned.
episodes.title: Not So Pretty in Pink

episodes.synopsis: Danny finally gets to customize a 1960 Chevy Delivery just the way he wants to; Mike finds himself going horn to horn with 2,000 pounds of angry bull.
episodes.title: Special Delivery

episodes.synopsis: Danny helps Shannon restore an old VW van; the shop helps a single mom find a '69 Ford Bronco so she can revisit her youth with her son.
episodes.title: Van Haulin

episodes.synopsis: An eccentric couple wants to turn an old ambulance into a ghost-hunting vehicle, which awakens a rogue spirit in the shop.
episodes.title: Ghost Rider

episodes.synopsis: Danny and Kevin go to see mad mechanic Gordon's latest creation; Danny shakes the rust off a '34 Ford and tries to turn it into a white-hot hot rod.
episodes.title: Quadzilla
